content: crochet pattern author of the pattern ivanna garazhdzhuk toysivanna hello my name is ivanna garazhdzhuk i am the author of the description of a crocheted little heart this pattern is designed for those who have basic crochet skills and do not contain crochet lessons difficulty level beginner if you have any questions or incomprehensible moments during process please contact us i will be happy to help you іnstagram facebook @made by ivanna e-mail garazdzuk i@gmail com viber telegram +380951346684 it is forbidden commercial use of this pattern its sale distribution and placement on electronic resources you can use the finished toy at your own discretion i would be grateful if when the publication of the finished toy in social networks you give a credit to the author of pattern @made by ivanna author of the pattern ivanna garazhdzhuk toysivanna necessary materials yarn yarnart dolce himalaya dolphin baby 120 m per 100 g or similar bulky/chunky weight yarn yarnart dolce color 745 - milky 753 - mint consumption about 10 g * polyester toy filling consumption about 5g * required tools hook size 4 mm crochet marker i use a contrasting cotton thread needle with a large eye for sewing on parts abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring or use ch2 single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease decrease 2 single_crochet together chain - chain … * n repeat instruction in brackets n times 12 total number of stitches in a round/row * yarn consumption may differ from indicated due to crochet density grade or color of yarn author of the pattern ivanna garazhdzhuk toysivanna heart 1r - 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2r - 6 increase 12 3r - 12 single_crochet 12 crochet slip_stitch cut the yarn leaving a long 6 in 15 cm yarn tail for sewing 4r - 10 single_crochet on the first half skip 2 single_crochet and crochet 10 single_crochet on the second half 20 sew up the hole between the halves 5r 3 single_crochet + decrease *4 16 6r 2 single_crochet + decrease *4 12 stuff the heart 7r 1 single_crochet + decrease *4 8 add fiberfill if it necessary 8r 4 decrease 4 crochet slip_stitch cut the yarn tighten the hole fasten_off and weave in the yarn ends you can sew keychain chain author of the pattern ivanna garazhdzhuk toysivanna congratulations your heart is ready i would be grateful if you share your impressions of crocheting and your results in reviews or a personal message if you want to crochet a teddy bear visit the store soft toys for children https //www etsy com/shop/toysivanna there is a pattern and a set of materials and tools for crochet a teddy bear author of the pattern ivanna garazhdzhuk toysivanna
